CustomField.formula: OR( LOWER(OtherStreet) == 'default', OtherStreet == '0', LOWER(OtherStreet)== '123 main street', LOWER(OtherCity) = 'default', LOWER(OtherCity) = 'anytown', LOWER(OtherState) = 'xx', OtherPostalCode = '99999', OtherPostalCode = '00000')
CustomField.label: Is Default Other Address
